Isolating Curse.name: Isolating Curse
Isolating Curse.flavor: You lay an imprecation on your adversary, driving its friends too far away to offer protection and opening your foe to attack.
Isolating Curse.attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will
Isolating Curse.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next  turn, the target grants combat advantage, and any enemy within 3 squares of the target takes a –4 penalty to attack rolls and cannot regain hit points.

Deadly Repercussions.name: Deadly Repercussions
Deadly Repercussions.flavor: Your curse attracts doom to your enemies, and it rewards with continued pain their insolent attacks against you and your allies.
Deadly Repercussions.attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will
Deadly Repercussions.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Deadly Repercussions.effect: The target grants combat advantage and has ongoing 10 damage (save ends both). Until the target saves against this effect, once each turn when the target hits an ally, roll 1d6. The target takes a penalty to saving throws equal to the result of this roll until the end of your next turn.

Fumbling Curse.name: Fumbling Curse
Fumbling Curse.flavor: With a word, you turn a sure strike into a glancing blow that momentarily throws your opponent off balance.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with an attack

Effect: Whenever the target makes an attack roll (including the attack roll that triggered this power), roll 1d6 and subtract the result from the target’s attack (save ends).
Fumbling Curse.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with an attack
Fumbling Curse.effect: Whenever the target makes an attack roll (including the attack roll that triggered this power), roll 1d6 and subtract the result from the target’s attack (save ends).
